node.html:
• Implemented my Two-Wheeler Doorstep Project (i.e. Manager, Client and Mechanic Android Applications)
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and API's such as Google Maps, Google Places, One Api by MSG91 and RazorPay
  • Managed a team of interns and worked collaboratively on daily basis using tools like Git/GitHub

• Underwent a training program covering topics like Big Data Engineering, Data Warehousing, Shell Scripting, Cloud Computing, Relational Database Management System (RDBMS), and Python Programming.
  • Gained hands-on experience and valuable insights into cutting-edge technologies, preparing for future challenges in the IT industry.
  • Developed proficiency in Python programming, RDBMS, and other essential skills through practical training and real-world applications.

• Worked in a dynamic and innovative environment at the RCOEM Technology Business Incubators Foundation (TBI), focusing on entrepreneurship promotion and innovation fostering.
  • Participated actively in entrepreneurship development programs, design thinking workshops, and business plan competitions, refining technical skills and gaining practical knowledge in technology integration.
  • Acquired experience in developing and integrating technologies for real-world applications.

• Worked with a fellow developer to build an Android Application for Soil Health Monitoring System at Center of Microsystems,RCOEM
  • Developed an Algorithm for comparing color of the sample to find out the corresponding PH and Concentration Level values of the appropriate nutrients (which includes Nitrogen,Phosphorous and Patassium)

• Was a part Web-Development Team of Technical Club,RCOEM
  • Worked with fellow developers and contributed in the developmet of cultural fest website of our college
